What should I keep in mind when reading forward-looking statements about the Verus Project?

When reading forward-looking statements about the Verus Project, you should be aware that they are subject to risks and uncertainties that could cause actual results to differ materially. You should not place undue reliance on these statements, especially when making financial decisions. These statements are subject to modification, update, or change for legitimate reasons both within or beyond the control of the Verus Project developers.
